feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 3:30 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening then west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
